div.p:
In continuation of my letter of the 27th of April,
See E. Armstrong to M, 27 April 1896 (in this edition as 96-04-07a). I have the honour to inform you that at the last meeting of the Trustees it was decided to adopt your suggestion that a number of copies of your work entitled "Select extra-tropical plants"
B95.08.04, 200 copies of which were requested on 8 September 1896, together with 200 copies of M's Key to the system of Victorian plants (see M to M Dowden, 12 April 1896 (in this edition as 96-04-12a)). be obtained for the purpose of distribution and exchange. An application will accordingly be made for a supply of these volumes.
Thanking you for your courtesy in this matter
